TEST_NAME: Column image links should have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
select a10.pass_yn,
       a10.application_id,
       a10.page_id,
       a10.region_name,
       a10.column_alias,
       a10.report_label,
       a10.column_linktext,
       a10.column_link_attr,
       a10.created_by, 
       a10.created_on, 
       a10.updated_by last_updated_by, 
       a10.updated_on last_updated_on,
       case when a10.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(
                    p_message => q'^Link Column %1, in report %0, is missing an aria-label. 
                    • Report Label/Heading : %2
                    • Link text : %3
                    • Link attributes : %4.
                    • Suggestion : 
                         - remove `alt=""` from the Link Text
                         - add `aria-label="edit #YOUR_COLUMN#"` to the Link Attributes
                    ^',
                    p0 => a10.region_name,
                    p1 => a10.column_alias,
                    p2 => a10.report_label,
                    p3 => a10.column_linktext,
                    p4 => a10.column_link_attr
                    )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a10.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^Column %1 (page %0, app %2) is missing an aria-label attribute^',
                                    p0 => a10.page_id,
                                    p1 => a10.column_alias,
                                    p2 => a10.application_id
                                    )
            end as issue_title,
      a10.component_id,
      a10.parent_component_id,
			a10.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when ic1.column_linktext is null
          then 'Y'
          when ic1.column_linktext like '%.png%'
          then case when ic1.column_linktext like '%alt=""%'
                    then 'N'
                    when ic1.column_linktext not like '%aria-label%'
                    then case when ic1.column_link_attr is null 
                            then 'N'
                            when ic1.column_link_attr not like '%aria-label%'
                            then 'N'
                            else 'Y'
                            end
                    else 'Y'
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end pass_yn,
     ic1.application_id,
     ic1.page_id,
     ic1.region_name,
     ic1.column_alias,
     ic1.report_label,
     ic1.column_linktext,
     ic1.column_link_attr,
     ic1.column_id component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
     coalesce(ic1.created_by, app.created_by) created_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.created_on, app.created_on) created_on, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_by, app.last_updated_by) updated_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_on, app.last_updated_on) updated_on,
	   ic1.workspace
     from apex_application_page_ir_col ic1
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = ic1.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = ic1.application_id
     inner join  v_apex_applications aa on ic1.application_id = aa.application_id
                                        and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
                                        and ic1.column_linktext is not null
	   where ic1.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a10
EXPLANATION:
Column image links should have accessible alt text : Link columns in reports that do not feature text (eg, they have the pencil symbol) should include “Alt” text. This alt-text will be displayed by a screen-reader in the web-elements rotor, “links” section. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content:  
    All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.
